screensframework

Class CustBookFilmPageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • screensframework.CustBookFilmPageController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable, ControlledScreen, CustToolbar

    public class CustBookFilmPageController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, ControlledScreen, CustToolbar
    Controller class for the Customer's film-booking page. This screen contains the summary information for the film and gives the customer an interactive seating display for the listing, allowing them to choose their seats.
    Author:
    Mark Backhouse

      • getSeatName

        public java.lang.String getSeatName(java.lang.Integer row,
                                    java.lang.Integer col)
        Reformats the simple seatnames provided by the database as 'nice' Strings that are more user-friendly for the Customer.
        Parameters:
        row - Seat's row number
        col - Seat's col number
        Returns:
        The seat's name as a nice string. e.g. if the seat is in row 0, col 5, the seat name will be "Seat A6" (rows/cols are zero-indexed)

      • goToCustConfirmPage

        Parameters:
